com.skobbler.ngx.navigation

Class SKAdvisorSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.navigation.SKAdvisorSettings

  • public class SKAdvisorSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about the audio advisor settings, that will be used during a navigation.
    Version:
    3.0.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SKAdvisorSettings.SKAdvisorLanguage
      Languages supported by the advisor.
      static class  SKAdvisorSettings.SKAdvisorType
      Type of audio advisor.

        Sets the advisor type.
        Parameters:
        advisorType - type of advisor (TTS based or audio-files based) Default value is SKAdvisorSettings.SKAdvisorType.AUDIO_FILES

      • getAdvisorConfigPath

        public java.lang.String getAdvisorConfigPath()
        Returns the path where are located the general config files for the advisor.
        Returns:
        the path where are located the general config files for the advisor.

      • setAdvisorConfigPath

        public void setAdvisorConfigPath(java.lang.String advisorConfigPath)
        Sets the path where are located the general config files for the advisor. See SKMaps.zip file. There is an Advisor folder which contains the general config files for the advisor. So, the advisorConfigPath has to be the absolute path to this folder after the unzip was done for SKMaps.zip
        Parameters:
        advisorConfigPath - new path where are located the general config files for the advisor.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return the optional advisor option
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        an int representing the advisor additional options
